scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.build.decompile: npm run build && wasm-decompile dist/graphics.wasm -o dist/graphics.c
scripts.build.wat: npm run build && wasm2wat dist/graphics.wasm -o dist/graphics.wat
scripts.build.asmjs: emcc graphics.c -o dist/graphics.js -s WASM=0  -O3 -s EXPORT_ALL=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_go', '_BUFFER']" --no-entry
scripts.build.clean: npm run clean && npm run build
